agency_name: Department of Small Business and Supplier Diversity
series_description: This series documents the Disadvantaged Business Enterprise (DBE) certification of businesses that seek to bid on state contracts funded by the US Department of Transportation and other federal sectors,. This series also documents the formerly certified businesses that have outgrown the program or for which their certification has lapsed or been revoked. This may include, but is not limited to: applications, documents required per the DBE application form, correspondence, and certification notices

agency_name: Department of Small Business and Supplier Diversity
series_description: This series documents the certification, or the denial of, and decertification of businesses as small, women-owned, and minority-owned (SWaM). This series may include, but is not limited to: applications, documents required by the certifying agency, correspondence, and notices.

agency_name: Department of Small Business and Supplier Diversity
series_description: This series documents SWaM plans and progress reports received from state agencies and institutions. This series may include, but is not limited to, plans and reports
